results.name: a(n) = A327860(A328841(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..32768
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: (PARI) A329031(n) = { my(s=0, m=1, p=2); while(n, if(n%p, m *= p; s += (1/p)); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (s*m); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 07 2019
